titleStmt.title: Tho. Kentish a trustee for certain indigent poor, his complaint of great injuries done [by] the city and their officers, Mr. Oddy and others, &c. drawn up at the invitation of the Lord Maior and Court of Aldermen, in their order dated Sept. 17. 1689. Wherein they honourably promise to hear his complaint, and do him right.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
